metadata.description: Fast local search across logs, traces, and events using SQLite

emptyState.primary: Enter a search query to find logs, traces, and events
emptyState.secondary: Local SQLite enables instant search across large datasets

items.firstVisit: First visit: REST fetch for initial data + background SQLite bootstrap

items.background: Background: PowerSync WebSocket keeps data in sync

metadata.title: Explore

dataStrategy.title: Data Strategy: REST only
dataStrategy.description: Detail views fetch fresh data from the API. No heavy filtering needed, so local SQLite is not used on this page.
